name: Swamp Dweller
text: You have trained with the Muckmouth lizardfolk of the Hao Jin Tapestry and learned their ways.
prerequisites: Str 13, must have visited the Hao Jin Tapestry.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on Swim checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Swim, the bonus increases to +4. This bonus doubles while youâ€™re in marshy terrain. <u>In addition, you can move normally into squares with a shallow bog, and it costs you only 2 squares of movement to move into a square with a deep bog</u>.
